Text: Forgot to mention!  Works with Mountain Lion!
Everything works fine except that you can't see through the portals wich makes it alot more frustrating to play..
@Kebablol - Try changing the "Portal Render Depth" setting in the options.
@Craimcap - I tried changing it from 0-9, but it still looked the same :/
@Kebablol, if you're running on PC, try running as an administrator if you aren't already.
Also, possibly try unzipping the .zip file with a different program.  It runs perfectly fine when I unzip with "The Unarchiver" on Mac, as oppose to the default "Archive Utility."
@CrimCap - I'm on a mac :P Thanks, will try unzipping it again later

For anyone having issues getting this to work on PC: The shortcut that was provided does not work because the directory is a place on the uploader's hard drive.

If you go into Contents/Resources/transgaming/c_drive you will find the .exe and make your own shortcut.
